original_text: But when someone told Herod, he said, ‘This man is surely John. I sent a soldier to cut off his head. But he has become alive again!’
korean_text: 헤롯은 듣고 이르되 내가 목 벤 요한 그가 살아났다 하더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 사람이 헤롯에게 말했을 때

sentences.original_text: I sent a soldier to cut off his head
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그의 목을 베기 위해 군인을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: But he has become alive again
